amendatorysection.para: (1) Minibike shall mean a two-wheel motor vehicle that:
(a) Has a total wheel and tire diameter of less than fourteen inches;
(b) Has an engine-rated capacity of less than forty-five cubic centimeters displacement;
(c) Has an engine power output of less than three horsepower;
(d) Has an engine-rated capacity of less than two thousand two hundred thirty-eight watts; or
(e) Was primarily designed by the manufacturer for off-road use only.
(2) Minibike shall not include an electric personal assistive mobility device.
